response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item carries a unique value that resonates with those seeking excellence and innovation. Considering its unparalleled quality and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire it at a special price of $850,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to own a piece that not only meets but surpasses the highest standards of craftsmanship and functionality. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 850000}
